Detailed Description

Stores the date, eg: 31 December 2011
Valid ranges are enforced by mutator methods, eg: November has 30 days.

bool Date::SetDayOfMonth ( const unsigned &  dd  ) 

Set the day of the month. Argument: unsigned

Parameters:
dd The day of the month, eg 1 - 31.
If an invalid day is specified (eg 32) then this method will have no effect and will return false.
Returns:
true if successful.

bool Date::SetMonth ( const unsigned &  mm  ) 

Set the month. Argument: unsigned

Parameters:
mm The month, eg 1 - 12.
If the current value for the day of the month is not valid with the given month,
(eg, 31 November) then this method will have no effect and will return false.
Returns:
true if successful.
